lead_paragraph: Plum Baby, the British baby food company founded by a former chef and mother of three, has agreed to sell itself to Darwin Private Equity for £10 million, The Telegraph reported.
snippet: Plum Baby, the British baby food company founded by a former chef and mother of three, has agreed to sell itself to Darwin Private Equity for $14.5 million, The Telegraph reported.
abstract: Plum Baby, the British baby food company founded by a former chef and mother of three, has agreed to sell itself to Darwin Private Equity for $14.5 million, The Telegraph reported.
